name: The Turncoat: a playbook for Interstitial, Our Hearts Intertwined.
name_original: The Turncoat: a playbook for Interstitial, Our Hearts Intertwined.
description:
You were a bad guy, maybe even THE bad guy for a time, but some damned kindhearted hero had to ruin it and bring you over to their side. You honestly are trying to improve, though. It’s slow, but progress is progress,

The Turncoat is a playbook made to play a former villain who has made their way into the party; this includes characters like Zuko, Kronk (as portrayed in Kingdom Hearts a forgotten Era) and many, many others.
